author: DeltaBravo
title: Dolphins coach Chris Foerster resigns after video surfaces of him inhaling powdery substance
summary: Foerster resigned after a woman published the incriminating video to Facebook.

author: third_watch
title: Vice President Mike Pence leaves Colts game over anthem 'disrespect'
summary: Vice President Mike Pence said he left the Colts game after the national anthem after some of the visiting San Francisco 49ers knelt in protest.

author: DeltaBravo
title: Las Vegas: Stephen Paddock 'gambled $1m a night' and had Valium doctor on retainer
summary: Stephen Paddock, the man who carried out the mass shooting in Las Vegas, gambled up to $1m a night and frequently popped Valium for anxiety. “How do I know that - because I know some of the video poker players that play big. Details of the 97-page testimony, obtained by CNN, come as police in Las Vegas, along with federal agents, are still struggling to identify a motive behind the attack, carried out on up to 22,000 people who were attending a country music festival taking place off the Las Vegas Strip.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: Raiders fans attempt to fight Donald Penn following third straight loss
summary: Things have gone from bad to worse for the Oakland Raiders. After Oakland dropped its third consecutive game in a 30-17 home defeat Sunday to Baltimore, offensive lineman Donald Penn encountered a slew of angry fans wanting to fight him as he left the stadium. Penn later tweeted that he was provoked by a bottle thrown at his Rolls Royce.

author: rocky.j.mountain
title: Worst rule in football robs Rams of touchdown, possession
summary: Terrible break for Los Angeles as Todd Gurley loses the ball at the worst possible point on the field.

author: captainunderoos
title: That's why Aaron Rodgers is the best quarterback on the planet
summary: Aaron Rodgers is the best player in the NFL, and it's probably not close. His touchdown to Davante Adams with 11 seconds left beat the Dallas Cowboys 35-31.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: Antonio Brown frustrated with Ben Roethlisberger, who 'spearheaded' anthem decision, report says
summary: Steelers WR Antonio Brown's sideline tirade reportedly was the result of "lingering resentment" regarding Ben Roethlisberger and the team's decision not to participate in the national anthem two weeks ago.

author: rocky.j.mountain
title: Trump Claims He Instructed VP Mike Pence To Walk Out Of Game Because Of National Anthem Kneel-Downs
summary: UPDATE:  President Donald Trump tweeted that he instructed VP Mike Pence to leave if there was a national anthem protest. Earlier, Pence walked out of the game between the Indianapolis Colts and San Francisco 49ers, citing his displeasure with players kneeling during the national anthem at the event. Pence issued a statement on his departure: “I left today's Colts game because President Trump and I will not dignify any event that disrespects our soldiers, our Flag, or our…
